episodes.title: S3E1: I Survived a Cult: The JENNIFER REDCAY story
episodes.description: In this eye-opening episode of Healing Sucks, host Jackey Hall speaks with Jennifer Redcay, who spent a decade trapped in a manipulative and abusive Christian cult. Jennifer shares her powerful story, recounting how her search for connection and a void left unfilled led her into an environment marked by control, isolation, and abuse. The conversation delves deep into the disturbing tactics cult leaders use to dominate their followers, including financial control, emotional manipulation, and physical and SA abuse. Jennifer bravely recounts the impact this had on her life and how she ultimately found the courage to break free. Her journey is a testament to the resilience of the human spirit. Jennifer reflects on her healing process and how she reclaimed her life through faith and inner strength with God. This episode is a must-listen for anyone seeking hope and insight into overcoming trauma and reclaiming personal freedom. WHERE CAN I FIND JENNIFER? TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@jenniferredcayauthor?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pc Facebook: Pushing Back The Darkness

episodes.title: S2E20 I Grew Up In Religious Abuse: The KERI BLACK Story Part 1
episodes.description: In this episode of the Healing Fucking Sucks podcast, host Jackey Hall speaks with Keri Black, a trauma and abuse survivor, about her experiences growing up in an extremist evangelical cult. Keri shares her journey of deconstructing her beliefs, the impact of her upbringing on her mental health, and her advocacy work for victims of abuse. The conversation delves into the complexities of healing from trauma, the challenges of navigating relationships with family still involved in the cult, and the importance of understanding personal truths in the recovery process. WERE CAN I FIND KERI BLACK?
